name: Tyrogue
author: Shigenori Negishi
flavor_text: Even though it is small, it can’t be ignored because it will slug any handy target without warning.

poke_body.name: Sweet Sleeping Face
poke_body.effect: As long as Tyrogue is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Tyrogue by attacks.

attacks.name: Mischievous Punch
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance. Tyrogue is now Asleep.
